00469    inline int AtomStorage::nAtom() const
00470    { return atomSet_.size(); }

00473    { return ghostSet_.size(); }

00484    /*
00485    * On master processor (rank=0), stored value of total number of atoms.
00486    */
00487    inline int AtomStorage::nAtomTotal() const
00488    {
00489       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00490       if (nAtomTotal_ < 0) UTIL_THROW("Value not set: nAtomTotal < 0");
00491       return nAtomTotal_;
00492       #else
00493       return atomSet_.size();
00494       #endif
00495    }
00496 
00497    // Template method definition
00498 
00499    /*
00500    * Count the number of atoms in this Group and this AtomStorage.
00501    */
00502    template <int N>
00503    int AtomStorage::countGroupAtoms(Group<N>& group) const
00504    {
00505       Atom* ptr;
00506       int nAtom = 0;
00507       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00508          ptr = atomPtrs_[group.atomId(i)];
00509          if (ptr) {
00510             if (ptr->isGhost()) {
00511                UTIL_THROW("Found ghost atom");
00512             }
00513             ++nAtom;
00514          }
00515       }
00516       return nAtom;
00517    }
00518 
00519    /*
00520    * Set pointers to atoms in a Group<N> object.
00521    */
00522    template <int N>
00523    int AtomStorage::findGroupAtoms(Group<N>& group) const
00524    {
00525       Atom* ptr;
00526       int nAtom = 0;
00527       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00528          ptr = atomPtrs_[group.atomId(i)];
00529          if (ptr) {
00530             group.setAtomPtr(i, ptr);
00531             ++nAtom;
00532          } else {
00533             group.clearAtomPtr(i);
00534          }
00535       }
00536       return nAtom;
00537    }
00538
